page.title: 09TRAFFIC IN RADSTOCK.
page.content: The biggest problem in Radstock is the traffic.We have traffic lights and people complain about them.They think that there should be a roundabout instead.The traffic lights were only put there a couple of years ago,but before that only two roads were held up,the road coming from Midsomer Norton and the road coming from Frome.Now all of the roads are held up because of the traffic lights.The advantages of having traffic lights is that it has cut down the amount of accidents,but the dissadvantages of having traffic lights is that it creates traffic problems all day especially between the times of 8am to 9.30am and 3pm to 6pm.The lights also create problems for people who wish to join the main roads from side roads. They cannot do so because of the queues.
